 137:                               double doc_topic_prior,
 138:                               double[::1] out) nogil:
 139:     """Dirichlet expectation for a single sample:
 140:         exp(E[log(theta)]) for theta ~ Dir(doc_topic)
 141:     after adding doc_topic_prior to doc_topic, in-place.
 142: 
 143:     Equivalent to
 144:         doc_topic += doc_topic_prior
 145:         out[:] = np.exp(psi(doc_topic) - psi(np.sum(doc_topic)))
 146:     """
 147: 
 148:     cdef np.float64_t dt, psi_total, total
 149:     cdef size_t i, size
 150: 
+151:     size = doc_topic.shape[0]
  __pyx_v_size = (__pyx_v_doc_topic.shape[0]);

 152: 
+153:     total = 0.0
  __pyx_v_total = 0.0;

+154:     for i in range(size):
  __pyx_t_1 = __pyx_v_size;
  __pyx_t_2 = __pyx_t_1;
  for (__pyx_t_3 = 0; __pyx_t_3 < __pyx_t_2; __pyx_t_3+=1) {
    __pyx_v_i = __pyx_t_3;

+155:         dt = doc_topic[i] + doc_topic_prior
    __pyx_t_4 = __pyx_v_i;
    __pyx_v_dt = ((*((double *) ( /* dim=0 */ ((char *) (((double *) __pyx_v_doc_topic.data) + __pyx_t_4)) ))) + __pyx_v_doc_topic_prior);

+156:         doc_topic[i] = dt
    __pyx_t_5 = __pyx_v_i;
    *((double *) ( /* dim=0 */ ((char *) (((double *) __pyx_v_doc_topic.data) + __pyx_t_5)) )) = __pyx_v_dt;

+157:         total += dt
    __pyx_v_total = (__pyx_v_total + __pyx_v_dt);
  }

+158:     psi_total = psi(total)
  __pyx_v_psi_total = __pyx_f_3lda_psi(__pyx_v_total);

 159: 
+160:     for i in range(size): ##prange(size, schedule='guided'):#range(size): ##

 165:     """Dirichlet expectation for multiple samples:
 166:     E[log(theta)] for theta ~ Dir(arr).
 167: 
 168:     Equivalent to psi(arr) - psi(np.sum(arr, axis=1))[:, np.newaxis].
 169: 
 170:     Note that unlike _dirichlet_expectation_1d, this function doesn't compute
 171:     the exp and doesn't add in the prior.

 315: 
 316:     # return exp_arr_2D;
 317: 
 318: 
 319: # Psi function for positive arguments. Optimized for speed, not accuracy.
 320: #
 321: # After: J. Bernardo (1976). Algorithm AS 103: Psi (Digamma) Function.
 322: # https://www.uv.es/~bernardo/1976AppStatist.pdf
 323: # @cython.cdivision(True)
+324: cdef double psi(double x) nogil:
static double __pyx_f_3lda_psi(double __pyx_v_x) {
  double __pyx_v_r;
  double __pyx_v_result;
  double __pyx_r;
  __Pyx_TraceDeclarations
  __Pyx_TraceCall("psi", __pyx_f[0], 324, 1, __PYX_ERR(0, 324, __pyx_L1_error));
/* … */
  /* function exit code */
  __pyx_L1_error:;
  __Pyx_WriteUnraisable("lda.psi", __pyx_clineno, __pyx_lineno, __pyx_filename, 1, 1);
  __pyx_r = 0;
  __pyx_L0:;
  __Pyx_TraceReturn(Py_None, 1);
  return __pyx_r;
}

+325:     if x <= 1e-6:
  __pyx_t_1 = ((__pyx_v_x <= 1e-6) != 0);
  if (__pyx_t_1) {
/* … */
  }

 326:         # psi(x) = -EULER - 1/x + O(x)
+327:         return -EULER - 1. / x
    __pyx_r = ((-__pyx_v_3lda_EULER) - (1. / __pyx_v_x));
    goto __pyx_L0;

 328: 
+329:     cdef double r, result = 0
  __pyx_v_result = 0.0;

 330: 
 331:     # psi(x + 1) = psi(x) + 1/x
+332:     while x < 6:
  while (1) {
    __pyx_t_1 = ((__pyx_v_x < 6.0) != 0);
    if (!__pyx_t_1) break;

+333:         result -= 1. / x
    __pyx_v_result = (__pyx_v_result - (1. / __pyx_v_x));

+334:         x += 1
    __pyx_v_x = (__pyx_v_x + 1.0);
  }

 335: 
 336:     # psi(x) = log(x) - 1/(2x) - 1/(12x**2) + 1/(120x**4) - 1/(252x**6)
 337:     #          + O(1/x**8)
+338:     r = 1. / x
  __pyx_v_r = (1. / __pyx_v_x);

+339:     result += log(x) - .5 * r
  __pyx_v_result = (__pyx_v_result + (log(__pyx_v_x) - (.5 * __pyx_v_r)));

+340:     r = r * r
  __pyx_v_r = (__pyx_v_r * __pyx_v_r);

+341:     result -= r * ((1./12.) - r * ((1./120.) - r * (1./252.)))
  __pyx_v_result = (__pyx_v_result - (__pyx_v_r * ((1. / 12.) - (__pyx_v_r * ((1. / 120.) - (__pyx_v_r * (1. / 252.)))))));

+342:     return result;
  __pyx_r = __pyx_v_result;
  goto __pyx_L0;
